name: Ohmygod Are You Alright?
description:
ohmygod are you alright is an autobiographical game about the experience and aftermath of getting hit by a car. it is a game about surviving. you could call it a survival horror. you could call it a direct sequel to my earlier game, dys4ia.

it is a game about walking a while in my shoes.

warning: trailer features some repeating flashing effects.
